loans.name: Hat's Group

texts.en:
Hat is 38 years old and lives with her family members in a rural area of Kampong Thom Province. She is a mother of 3 children. 

Hat grows rice for a living, and she also works for others for a fee to earn additional income. She has been involved in this business for 20 years and earns about 47,000 KHR per day. 

This is the first loan cycles for Hat's group with Kiva's partner VisionFund. She is leading her group of 4 to access this loan. As the group leader, she will use her loan portion to build a private toilet for her family’s use. 

Hat hopes all her family members will have good health and hygiene.

loans.use: to build a private toilet.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, sus tres hijos y su nieto, el se dedica a la agricultura siembra maíz, maicillo y frijoles, desde hace 45 años  que se dedica a la actividad, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa y con lo que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insecticidas, fertilizantes, abono, semillas, etc. y asi poder tener una mejor cosecha para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Francisco is 59 years old and lives in his own house with his wife, his three children, and his grandson. He makes a living in agriculture, planting corn, sorghum, and beans. For 45 years he has been doing this work. He sells his products in the different markets located near his house, and with what he earns, he manages to pay for some of his household expenses. 

He is asking for a loan to buy insecticides, fertilizers, compost, seeds, etc. and that way be able to have a better harvest to have better earnings.

loans.use: to buy insecticides, fertilizers, compost, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Ana-Lyn

texts.en:
Ana-lyn, 36, is a married woman with two children, both of whom are in school. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Ana-lyn has a soft-drink retailing business in the Philippines. She has requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of soft-drinks to resell.

Ana-lyn has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to build and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of soft-drinks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for the degree course for her professional career

loans.name: Guerla

texts.fr: Guerla a 44 ans. Elle est mariée et mère d’un enfant qui est régulièrement scolarisé. Depuis tantôt 10 ans, elle fait le commerce de vêtements et chaussures d’occasion au marché communal de la ville. Une commerçante déterminée, elle grossit petit à petit sa clientèle. Elle a déjà obtenu des prêts chez Palmis Mikwofinans Sosyal qui l’ont aidé à faire fonctionner son activité. Guerla veut agrandir davantage son commerce et s’offrir de meilleures conditions de vie. Voulant mieux satisfaire ses clients, elle a sollicité un microcrédit afin d’augmenter ses marchandises.
texts.en:
Guerla is 44 years old. She is married and the mother of a child who regularly attends school. For nearly 10 years, she has been selling clothes and used shoes in the city's municipal market.

A determined merchant, she is gradually expanding her customer base. She has already obtained loans from Palmis Mikwofinans Sosyal who helped her run her business. Guerla wants to expand her business further and improve her living conditions.

Seeking to increase customer satisfaction, she is requesting a micro-credit loan to increase her stock of merchandise.

loans.use: buy a stock of used shoes

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Hùng Thành Đa Lộc Group

texts.en:
Mrs Khánh operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase more tools for fishing.

Khánh is 52 years old and she is married with 2 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 Hùng Thành Đa Lộc solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

This is Khánh first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Khánh hopes that her family will be healthy and happy, that her business will do well, and that her children can find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase more for fishing.

loans.name: Alijon

texts.en: Alijon is a serious and honest man.  He is 37 years old, married, and the father of two children.  He lives with his family in the Spitamen district.  His wife works in agriculture and grows wheat.  She rents a plot of land measuring 0.2 hectares.  Alijon himself works as a carrier at the market.  He also has a barn at home, as well as some cattle feed.  He has decided to start a new business and to get involved in animal husbandry.  However, he doesn't have the financial means to buy livestock, so for this reason he's taking a loan.  This loan will help him to purchase some livestock and to have his own business.

loans.use: to buy livestock and start a new business.

loans.name: Ly's Group

texts.en: A mother of nine children, five of them in school, and living in Kampong Thom province, Ly is 53 years old. Nowadays, she can earn income to support her family via growing rice, which she has done for twenty years. For Ly, this is her second loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) and she has fully repaid her past loan successfully. The previous loan helped her to have enough to use for consumption and the ability to send her children to school. She leads a group of four to get a new loan. As the group leader, she will spend her loan portion to build a private toilet for her family’s use. She hopes all her family members will have good health and hygiene.

loans.use: to build a private toilet

loans.name: Mislaine

texts.fr: Mislaine a 29 ans. Elle est célibataire et  n’a pas encore d’enfants. Depuis tantôt 3 ans, elle a ouvert un dépôt de produits alimentaires en gros. Jeune entrepreneuse, très fougueuse, elle est dévouée à faire fonctionner davantage son activité. Elle désire agrandir son commerce et mieux investir dans ses études universitaires. Voulant profiter des avantages qu’elle a dans sa zone, elle a sollicité un microcrédit afin d’augmenter son stock de marchandises.
texts.en:
Mislaine is 29 years old. She is single and has no children. For nearly three years, she has operated a wholesale depot of food products.

A young, very spirited entrepreneur, she is committed to further increasing her activity. She wants to expand her business and better invest in her university studies.

Wanting to take advantage of opportunities available in her area, she applied for a micro-credit loan to increase her stock of merchandise.

loans.use: buy bags of potato chips

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Thôn Lý Nam Xã Thăng Bình Group

texts.en:
Bạo is 45 years old and she is married with three children.

Bạo works in agriculture raising livestock. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of skills. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future. This is Bạo's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Bạo is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 thôn Lý Nam xã Thăng Bình solidarity group, which consists of three members.

With her business profit, Bạo hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Cléante

texts.fr: Cléante est âgée de 58 ans. Elle est divorcée et mère de 3 enfants qui sont régulièrement scolarisés. Elle est propriétaire d'une boutique de de produits alimentaires. Elle fait une demande de microcrédit pour diversifier son stock de marchandises. Elle souhaite maximiser ses profits en vue d’offrir de meilleures conditions de vie à sa famille
texts.en:
Cleante is 58 years old. She is a divorced mother of three children who regularly attend school. She owns a grocery store.

She requested a micro-credit loan to diversify her stock of goods. She wants to maximize her profits to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: add a shelf of sweets to her grocery store

loans.name: Gladys

texts.fr: Gladys a  52 ans. Mariée, elle a six enfants dont deux sont déjà mariés, les autres vivent encore sous sa responsabilité. Elle vend des produits cosmétiques, cela lui procure des revenus pour répondre aux besoins immédiats de la famille et pour épargner un peu d’argent. Elle a besoin d’un microcrédit pour acheter un stock de shampooing.
texts.en:
Gladys is 52 years old. She is married and has six children, two of whom are already married, and others are still living under her care.

She sells cosmetics, which provides her with income to meet her family's immediate needs and also to save some money. She needs a micro-credit loan to buy a stock of shampoo.

loans.use: buy a stock of shampoo

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy crates of cooking oil

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to enable him to produce a number of litres of milk to supply his customers daily.

loans.name: Nhóm 13 Thôn Lý Đông Xã Thăng Bình Group

texts.en:
Tiên is 37 years old and she is married with two children.

Tiên works in agriculture raising livestock. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Tiên faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

In 2012, Tiên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She is the leader of a three-member group, the Nhóm 13 thôn Lý Đông xã Thăng Bình solidarity group.

With her business profit, Tiên hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and for her business to do well.

loans.use: to purchase more baby livestock to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Jean Louis

texts.fr:
Jeans Louis a 61 ans. Depuis sa 25ème années, il est dans dans la vente des ustensiles de pâtisserie et de grillades de fabrication locale, sauf au début, il n'était que l'employé de sa grande sœur  (pendant environ 15 ans). En 2000,avec ses plusieurs années d'expériences et avec ses efforts il pouvait avec sa femme ouvrir son propre affaire. 
Son esprit de perfectionnement professionnel et son désir d'être indépendant et autonome lui poussait à travailler dur. En fait, avec son travail acharné il arrivait à offrir à sa famille une qualité de vie meilleur et à ses enfants une meilleur éducation . Il a 4 enfants qui sont tous déjà mariés et n'habitent plus avec lui et qui peuvent voler de leurs propres ailes. 
Et maintenant, il veut assurer son futur , sa retraite, c'est pourquoi, il veut maintenir son affaire en bonne marche.
texts.en:
Jean Louis is 61 years old and has been selling locally-produced, baking and cooking utensils for 25 years.  For the first 15 years he worked for his older sister, then, in 2000, he and his wife opened their own business.  He works very hard and is very motivated by his professionalism and desire to be independent and self-supporting.

Thanks to the success of his business, Jean Louis has been able to offer his family a better standard of living and his children a better education.  His four children are now all married and have flown the family nest.

Jean Louis wants to keep his business running well so that he can provide for his future retirement.

loans.use: to buy cookers, weighing scales, wooden boards, rolling pins, spatulas and grilling utensils for sale in his shop.

loans.name: Nhóm 16 Thắng Hùng Group

texts.en:
Mrs Kiên has a manufacturing business making carpet. She is requesting a loan to purchase more materials to make carpet to sell.

Kiên is 41 years old and she is married with 3 children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 16 Thắng Hùng solidarity group, which consists of 3 members. 

In 2012, Kiên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Kiên has successfully repaid 2 loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women.

Kiên has been involved in this business for more than 10 years and one of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Kiên hopes that her family will be healthy and happy, that her business will do well, and that her children will be able to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase more materials to make carpet to sell.

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Thôn Bình Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Hoa operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase processed seafood to resell. Hoa has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. Hoa is 36 years old and is married with three children. She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

Hoa is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 Thôn Bình Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of three members. In 2011, Hoa joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hoa has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Hoa faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hoa hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Nhóm 03 Tống Sở Trung Chính Group

texts.en:
Yến is 46 years old and she is married with three children.

Yến works in agriculture raising poultry. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Vinh faces in her business is the lack of capital. She is requesting a loan to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

In 2008, Yến joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid two loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Yến is the group leader of the Nhóm 03 Tống Sở Trung Chính solidarity group, which consists of four members.

With her business profit, Yến hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to maintain a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase more baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Nhóm 09 Thôn Hòa Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyệt operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell.

Nguyệt is 24 years old and married with three children. Nguyệt is the group leader of the Nhóm 09 Thôn Hòa Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of six members. She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Nguyệt's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Nguyệt has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Nguyệt faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nguyệt hopes for her business to do well, to make enough money to provide for her kids, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Lorna

texts.en:
Lorna is 37 years old and married with two children.

Lorna works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, cooking oil, milk, sugar, coffee, and other personal care products.

Lorna has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from food vending and E-Loading.

Lorna aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell, such as canned goods, noodles, spices, cooking oil, milk, sugar, coffee, and other personal care products

loans.name: Warlita

texts.en:
Warlita is 58 years old and a widow with five children.

Warlita works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 14,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

Warlita has borrowed and repaid four loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 15 years and also earns an income from farming sugarcane.

Warlita aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of groceries to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase her working capital and buy a large quantity of rice, palm oil and charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for one Fresh Life toilet.

loans.name: Seydou's Group

texts.fr: Seydou qui se trouve sur la photo assit au premier rang, tiens la pochette myAgro,il est la troisième personne en comptant de la gauche vers la droite, est membre d’un groupe de 7 agriculteurs inscrits à myAgro, vivent et travaillent dans le village de Kokele au sud-est de Bamako au Mali. Seydou, âgé de 57 ans, est le père de 5 enfants âgés de 3 à 16 ans, dont 4 d’entre eux sont actuellement scolarisés. L’ancrage de la tradition familiale dans la pratique agricole, source principale de revenu et de l’autosuffisance alimentaire du foyer, mais aussi l'amour de l'agriculture, ont incité Seydou à exercer cette activité depuis maintenant 40 ans. Seydou cultive le mais sur sa parcelle mais doit faire face en tant qu’agriculteur à des difficultés telles que le manque de pluie et de matériels agricoles. Seydou entame sa première année avec myAgro, et s'est inscrit en raison des semences de qualité  et de la perspective de pouvoir augmenter son rendement à travers les services proposés par myAgro. Cette année Seydou effectue des paiements pour acheter un paquet myAgro des semences OPV et d'engrais pour la culture de maïs afin d’augmenter ses rendements sur sa parcelle de 0.5 hectare. Cela fait maintenant 25 ans que Seydou cultive le mais pour sa rentabilité productive et marchande. Seydou planifie avec l’augmentation de ses rendements et de son revenu  diversifier les cultures et acheter du matériel agricole. Enfin Seydou espère aussi pouvoir autosuffisance alimentaire.
texts.en:
Seydou is the third person sitting from left to right in the photo holding his myAgro packet. He is member of a group of seven farmers, enrolled in myAgro, who live and work in the village of Kokele, to the southeast of Bamako in Mali.

57-year-old Seydou is the father of five children from three to sixteen years old, of whom four currently attend school. Family tradition is anchored in the practice of agriculture, the main source of income and food self-sufficiency of the home. Love of agriculture also prompted Seydou to perform this activity for the past 40 years.

Seydou grows maize on his plot of land but as a farmer must face difficulties such as the lack of rain and of agricultural equipment. Seydou is in his first year with myAgro, and enrolled due to the need for quality seeds and the prospect of increasing his efficiency through services offered by myAgro.

This year Seydou is making payments to buy a package of myAgro OPV  (Open-Pollinated Variety) seeds and fertilizer for the maize, to increase crop yield on his 0.5 hectare plot (1.24 acres). He has been cultivating maize for the past 25 years, for its production and commercial profitability.

With increased yields and income Seydou plans to diversify crops and buy farm equipment. Finally, he also hopes to achieve food self-sufficiency.

loans.use: Buy a package of OPV (Open-Pollinated Variety) seeds and fertilizer to cultivate maize

loans.name: Tinatin

texts.en: Tinatin is 36 years old. She lives with her husband in Kutaisi district. Nino works as a cleaner and gets 400 GEL monthly, which is the only source of income for the family. She decided to start an additional business to increase the family income. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo enables her to get a loan of 1200 USD. With the received credit she will purchase a stock of clothes at wholesale prices and will resell them with a price markup. This will give her an additional income and she will be able to improve the living conditions of her family. Tinatin awaits your support.

loans.use: to begin to trade clothes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chargers, earphones, cases, shells, memory cards, etc.

loans.name: Nhóm 10 Thôn Hải -Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Lượng operates a food stall/restaurant selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase more fish to resell. Lượng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.

Lượng is 53 years old and is married with five children. She lives and works in Quang Xuong district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. Lượng is the group leader of the Nhóm 10 Thôn Hải -Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of seven members. 

In 2009, Lượng joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Lượng has successfully repaid six loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Lượng faces in her business is the lack of capital. With her business profit, Lượng hopes for her business to do well, for her children to find good jobs, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy smoked fish.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy different types of sandals, ballerinas, photo frames, wall clocks, shawls, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow to enable him to start a retail business which deals with the sale of motorcycle spare parts.

loans.name: Noeun's Group

texts.en: A local resident living in Kampong Thom province, Noeun is 64 years old and the mother of seven children. She can earn income to improve her family’s living via rice cropping and fishing. For Noeun, this is her group’s first loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). In a group of two, she is the group leader. She will spend her entire loan portion to buy a decent latrine. Through this loan, she hopes that her family members will have good health and improve their living lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy a decent latrine

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy groundnut seeds.

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
This is Vivian. She is currently working with her retail business in Intramuros, Manila, Philippines. Having been able to get a loan worth PHP 10,000, she was able to purchase more supplies of bulb onions and local garlic, which made her earn better profit. Through her business, she can now provide and support her family's daily needs. 

However, Vivian dreams of expanding her inventory. This is why she is asking for another PHP 20,000 loan. With this, she will be able to increase the quantity of supplies of her selected products. She will utilize the loan to buy more onions and garlic, which are basic ingredients in every Filipino dish. For sure, profit will increase since her items are what people usually purchase. In advance, she says thanks for your consideration and generosity. 

As of now, what Vivian hopes is just to simply grow her business and be in peace without problems intruding. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

*All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group comprises 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of bulb onions and garlic to sell in the market.

loans.name: Nhóm 11 Cụm 03 Thôn Thắng Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs Liên has a retail business selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell. Liên has been involved in this business for six years.

Liên is 32 years old and is married with two children. Liên lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province. Liên is the group leader of the Nhóm 11 Cụm 03 Thôn Thắng Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of seven members. 

In 2014, Liên joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Liên has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. The main hardship that Liên faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Liên hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Mansa

texts.fr: Femme dynamique et très entreprenante, Mansa est une femme marié âgée de  33 ans. Mansa habite à Adidogomé travaille pour assurer les quatre enfants à sa charge. Pour réaliser son revenu, Mansa vend des friperies dans son quartier et gagne sa vie à travers  ce commerce. Mansa s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et souhaite ce prêt pour commander des serviettes et des draps. Mansa souhaite augmenter son bénéfice et aider son mari à promouvoir l’éducation de ses enfants.
texts.en: A dynamic and entrepreneurial woman, Mansa is 33 years old and married. She lives in Adidogomé and works so that she can take care of her four dependent children. She makes a living by selling second-hand linen in her district. Mansa gets her supplies twice a month at the market and would like this loan so that she can order some towels and sheets. Mansa would like to increase her profits and help her husband ensure that the children get an education.

loans.use: to buy 40 towels and 15 sheets.

loans.name: Ramata Bakary's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois a été créé le 23Janvier 2003 lors l’inauguration du dit banc villageois. Ce groupement vient d’entamer son vingt quatrième cycle et ne compte que des femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles  ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Ramata (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée)  est l’emprunteuse vedette du  groupe. Elle est âgée de 28 ans, mariée et mère de 03 enfants dont un garçon et 02 filles. Elle est vendeuse de vêtements et de chaussures.

 Avec son nouveau prêt, elle compte acheter des chaussures et des pochettes par douzaine à 25000f la douzaine et les revendre en détails.

 Les bénéfices réalisés, lui permettront de d’aider son mari dans la dépense quotidienne et pour épargner.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was created on the 23rd of January 2003. The group is now on its 24th loan cycle and is made up of women who all live in the same village. They enjoy a good understanding and a good group spirit. Their main business is retail.

Ramata (sitting on the far right and raising her hand) is the group's featured borrower. She is 28 years old, married and the mother of 3 children (one boy and two girls). She sells clothes and shoes. She plans to use her new loan to buy shoes and dozens of small bags (at 2 500 francs per dozen) and to resell them to retail customers. The profits she earns will enable her to help her husband with the daily expenses and to build savings.

loans.use: to buy shoes and dozens of small bags.

loans.name: Normelita

texts.en:
Normelita has been an active member of CCT since 2009. She has already acquired several loans to support her capital, which she uses for business. She has never failed to repay all her dues on time and she became successful at improving her way of life through her investments.

For years now, she has engaged herself in a direct selling business. Most of her relatives, friends and neighbors are patronizing the direct selling products that she sells. Aside from the fact that they know her well, she gives them reasonable discounts so they will choose to order more items. The items she sells range from clothing items, footwear, and undergarments to cosmetics products and others through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, etc. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalogue, and these are the profits that dealers are investing on as their income. She earns a minimum of PHP 2,500 in sales every week.

To improve her sales and profit, she is requesting from the ever-generous Kiva lenders a loan of PHP 8,000. She will be buying more supplies of merchandise products that she needs in her business. 

Normelita hopes that her business will thrive more. She aims someday to own and manage a bigger business to help her cope with their daily needs and expenses. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her life and business every week and draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To buy additional supplies of merchandise and other direct selling items

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is 57 years old, married and has seven children.

Emily is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines. Emily requested a PHP 9,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Emily has been in this business for 30 years now. She earns additional income from her general store and has borrowed two times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

She would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Harriet

texts.en: Harriet is a 33-year-old widow with three children living in Bundibugyo, Uganda. She sells secondhand clothes to the people around her town and has been in business for 10 years. She is a hardworking woman charged with the responsibility of looking after her children and gets additional income from cocoa selling. Harriet faces the hardships of competition and limited capital to meet all her personal and business expectations. She used the previous loan to buy secondhand clothes and cocoa to sell and is now requesting another one to buy secondhand clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy secondhand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Patila

texts.ru: Патила успешно погасила свой кредит, использовав его по назначению. Она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог в финансировании. В обороте на сегодня есть товар на сумму 150,000 сом (KGS). Ее ежемесячная прибыль на сегодня составляет около 20,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, она вновь обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на увеличение ассортимента товара. Доходы от кредита Патила планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего бизнеса и приобретение земельного участка.
texts.en: Patila successfully repaid her previous loan, after using it for its intended purpose.  She is thankful to Kiva and to all the lenders who helped her obtain this financing.  She currently has 150,000 som (KGS) worth of inventory and she makes a monthly income of about 20,000 som (KGS).  In order to further grow her business, she has once more turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to increase her assortment of goods.  She is planning to use the earnings from her loan to further grow her business and to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to buy women's clothing to sell on a retail basis.

loans.name: Ma. Luisa

texts.en:
Ma. Luisa is 56 years old with six children. The oldest is 31 and the youngest is 7 years old.

Her husband is a tricycle driver with PHP 300 income daily.

With their expenses and four of their children still in school, their income can barely support their needs.  To help out, she put up a sari-sari store (small grocery store) and sells noodles, candies, biscuits and snack food in front of their house where she earns a net of PHP 200 daily. 

Ma. Luisa wanted to expand and add more items to her store to generate more income and help more with their expenses.

Ma. Luisa is now requesting a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy 5 sacks of rice, 2 boxes of canned goods and 10 pieces peanut butter, soft drinks and noodles as additional items she can sell in her store, since these are in demand in their community.

Ma. Luisa wanted to expand her store to help more with the continuing education of her children.

loans.use: To buy 5 sacks of rice, 2 boxes of canned goods and 10 pieces peanut butter, soft drinks and noodles as additional items she can sell in her store

loans.name: Fatoumata's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois a été créé le 23Janvier 2003 lors l’inauguration du dit banc villageois. Ce groupement vient d’entamer son vingt quatrième cycle et ne compte que des femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles  ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Fatoumata (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée)  est l’emprunteuse vedette du  groupe. Elle est âgée de 50 ans, mariée et mère de 04 enfants dont un garçon et 03 filles. Elle est vendeuse de patte d’arachide  au marché.

Son nouveau prêt va lui permettre d’acheter 05 sacs d’arachide à 15000f le sac, après transformation, elle les revend en détails. Ses charges lui reviennent à 35 000f (transformation, transport etc.…)

Les bénéfices réalisés, lui permettront de faire de l’élevage et de participer aux dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et renforcer ses épargnes.
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was inaugurated on the 23rd of January 2003. The group is now on its 24th loan cycle and is made up of women who all live in the same village. They enjoy a good understanding and a good group spirit. They are principally small retailers.

Fatoumata (sitting on the far right and raising her hand) is the group's featured borrower. She is 50 years old, married and the mother of 4 children (one boy and three girls). She sells peanut butter at the market. Her new loan will enable her to buy 5 bags of peanuts (at 15 000 francs per bag) which, after processing, she will resell to retail customers. Her expenses total 35 000 francs (for processing, transport, etc.). The profits she makes will enable her to raise livestock, to contribute to the daily family expenses and to build her savings.

loans.use: to buy 5 bags of peanuts and cover processing and transport expenses.

loans.name: Tening's Group

texts.fr:
Le banc villageois a été créé le 23Janvier 2003 lors l’inauguration du dit banc villageois. Ce groupement vient d’entamer son vingt quatrième cycle et ne compte que des femmes qui habitent toutes le même village. Elles jouissent d’une bonne entente et d’un bon esprit de groupe. Elles  ont comme activité principale le petit commerce.

Madame Tening (assise à l’extrême droite avec une main levée)  est l’emprunteuse vedette du  groupe. Elle est âgée de64 ans, mariée et mère de 03 enfants dont un garçon et deux filles. Elle est vendeuse de patte d’arachide.

 Son nouveau prêt va lui permettre d’acheter 02 sacs d’arachide à 12500f le sac, après transformation, elle les revend en détails (des sceaux de 50 kg) à 10000 f le sceau.

Les bénéfices réalisés, lui permettront d’acheter un veau pou l’élever et s’occuper de ses enfants (soins médicaux et scolarités).
texts.en:
This "banc villageois" was inaugurated on the 23rd of January 2003. The group is starting its 24th loan cycle and is made up of women who all live in the same village. They enjoy a good understanding and a good group spirit. They are principally small retailers.

Tening (sitting on the far right and raising her hand) is the group's featured borrower. She is 64 years old, married and the mother of 3 children (one boy and two girls). She sells peanut butter. Her new loan will enable her to buy 2 bags of peanuts (at 12 500 francs per bag) which, after processing, she will resell to retail customers (in 50-kilo buckets at 10 000 francs per bucket). The profits she makes will enable her to buy a calf to raise and to cover her children's medical and educational expenses.

loans.use: to buy 2 bags of peanuts for processing and resale.

loans.name: Nhóm 01 Cụm 18 Thôn Tân Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hà has a retail business selling vegetables. She is requesting a loan to purchase vegetables to resell.

Hà is 39 years old and she is married with three children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 01 Cụm 18 Thôn Tân Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of four members. Hà lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2012, Hà joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Hà has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for six years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hà hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to resell

loans.name: Henrylin

texts.en:
Henrylin is married and she works hard to support her family.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines and earns additional income from fishing. Henrylin is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy more snack foods to resell.

Henrylin has been sustaining her business activities through her past eight loans from NWTF and more recently, through Kiva. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business and continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more snack foods to resell.

loans.name: Kulsina

texts.ru: Кулсина, 51 год, замужем, есть сын, ему 12 лет, образование высшее. Она работает на почте и занимается сельским хозяйством. В ведении бизнеса помогают муж и сын. Кулсина человек ответственный и предприимчивый, умеющий правильно вести хозяйство и вкладывать средства по назначению, среди соседей и знакомых имеет авторитет, характеризуется как человек отзывчивый и доброжелательный. Свой бизнес она начинала в 1995 году, с накопленных 10,000 KGS. В настоящее время Кулсина в своем активе имеет 2 коровы, 20 овец. На 2,90 Га земли выращивает фасоль. Имеются все условия для содержания скота. Свою деятельность осуществляет на основании своего многолетнего опыта, знает все тонкости в сфере животноводства и полеводства. Кулсина обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку нетели и 10 овец. За счет прибыли от проекта Кулсина собирается и дальше развивать свое дело.
texts.en: Kulsina is 51 years old, married, and she has a 12-year-old son.  She has a college education and works at the post office.  She is also involved in agriculture.  Her husband and her son help her with this activity.  Kulsina is responsible and she has an enterprising spirit.  She runs her business very well and knows how to invest her money wisely.  She has a certain authority among her neighbors and friends and she is known as a kind and caring person.  She started her own business in 1995 with 10,000 KGS worth of savings.  She currently owns two cows and 20 sheep.  She also grows beans on 2.9 hectares of land.  She has everything she needs to keep livestock.  She carries out her activity based on many years of experience and she knows everything there is to know about animal husbandry and agriculture.  Kulsina has turned to Bai Tushum Bank CJSC and requested a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) to buy one heifer and 10 sheep.  With the profits from this project, she is planning to further grow her business.

loans.use: to buy one heifer and 10 sheep in order to increase the size of her herd.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en:
Nena is 53 years old and has seven children. Nena is a married woman.

Nena is in the agricultural business farming corn in the Philippines. Nena requested a PHP 29,500 loan through NWTF to buy seedlings and fertilizers for her business.

Nena has been in this business for 15 years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain her business.

In the future, Nena would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy seedlings and fertilizer for her business

loans.name: Saturnino

texts.es: Saturnino de 47 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus cinco hijos, el se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y maicillo, también trabaja como albañil, se dedica a esa actividad desde hace 12 años sus padres le enseñaron el trabajo agrícola, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logras solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas semillas, abonos, fertilizantes, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía para poder seguir con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Saturnino is 47 years old. He lives in his own house with his five children. He works as a farmer planting corn and sorghum but also works as a bricklayer. He has been a farmer for 12 years and it is something that his father taught him how to do. From his sales he manages to pay off some of his household expenses. He is asking for a loan to buy more seeds, manure, fertiliser, etc. and to improve his plot of land which is visible in the photo. This loan would enable him to carry on working and improve his income.

loans.use: to buy more seeds, manure, fertiliser, etc. and to improve his plot of land.

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер молодой мужчина 38 лет. Женат, отец четверых детей. Алишер очень трудолюбивый и ответственный человек. Алишер сам вырос в рабочей семье. С малых лет отец Алишера приучал его к труду. И с детства он помогал своему отцу по хозяйству. Его семья  занималась откормом крупно рогатого скота. После женитьбы Алишер взял всю ответственность за свою семью на себя. У него отдельное хозяйств. Для того чтобы улучшить семейное состояние Алишер трудится из-за всех сил. В данное время он дома содержит скот откармливает перепродаёт его. Так же он занимается выпрашиванием дыни и арбуза. С наступлением весны Алишер начинает работу на поле. Летом свой скот он забирает на поле для откорма тем самым он экономит на покупке корма для скота. Алишер нуждается в дополнительных средствах для приобретения новых скотов.
texts.en: Alisher, age 38, is a young married man and the father of four children.  He is very hardworking and responsible.  He was raised in a working-class family.  His father introduced him to work at a very early age.  From his childhood also, Alisher started to help his father around the farm, as the family was involved in cattle fattening.  After he got married, Alisher took full responsibility of his family.  He now has his own farm.  In order to improve his family's situation, he works as hard as he can.  At the moment he has some livestock at home, which he feeds and then resells.  He also grows cantaloupes and watermelons.  When spring comes in, he starts working on the land.  In the summer he takes his livestock to pastures and thus saves on the purchase of cattle feed.  Alisher needs additional financial means in order to buy more livestock.

loans.use: to buy cattle for further resale.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es: Santos de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, el se dedica a la siembra de maíz, frijol y maicillo, cuenta con 15 años de experiencia en el rubro, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, y mejorar el terreno donde desea realizar las siembra para poder tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Santos is 59 years old and lives in his own house with his three children. He works as a farmer, planting beans and sorghum. He has been do this for 15 years. He sells his products in the areas around where he lives and from his sales he manages to pay off some of his household expenses. He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertiliser, manure, pest control, weed killer and to improve the plot of land where he wants to plant his crops. He hopes this loan will enable him to improve his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertiliser, manure, pest control, weed killer and to improve his plot of land.

loans.name: Gabriel

texts.es: Gabriel de 50 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos (maíz, frijol y maicillo), el se dedica desde hace 30 años a esa actividad, comercializa sus productos en los pueblos aledaños y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas y mejorar el terreno que muestra en la fotografía y así poder tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en: Gabriel is 50 years old and lives in his own house with his wife. He is a farmer of basic grains (corn, beans and sorghum). He has been doing this for 30 years. He sells his products in the neighbouring towns and from what he earns from his sales, he manages to pay off some of his household expenses. He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, fertiliser, manure, pest control, weed killer and to improve his plot of land which is visible in the photo. In this way, he hopes that the loan will help him improve his income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertiliser, manure, pest control, weed killer and to improve his plot of land.

loans.name: Jose Jacobo

texts.es: José de 34 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la reparación de bicicletas y a la agricultura, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar,  el quiere mejorar su vivienda construyendo un cuarto en el lugar que muestra la fotografía pero como no tiene de suficiente capital por eso solicita un crédito para la compra de cemento, arena, hierro, ladrillos y pago de mano de obra, así el y su familia puedan vivir más cómodos.
texts.en: Jose, 34, lives in his own house with his family.  He repairs bicycles and works in agriculture.  With the income from work he covers some of the househdold expenses.  Jose wants to improve his home by building a room in the space pictured in the photo.  Since he does not have enough capital to do so he is requesting a loan to buy cement, sand, iron and bricks, and to pay labor costs.  This is so he and his family can live more comfortably.

loans.use: To buy cement, sand, iron and bricks, and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer de 25 años de edad, es casada tiene una linda familia de tres hijos de las edades entre 1 y 9 años, esta humilde familia vive en una comunidad de Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan.
Rosa con el afán de generar sus ingresos y apoyar a su esposo con los gastos de la casa, se dedica a la compra y venta de ropa típica, esta actividad lo realiza desde hace cinco años, gracias a esta labor ha logrado mantener a su familia.
Rosa es una gran madre que se preocupa de solucionar las necesidades de su familia y ahora quiere priorizar la terminación de construir su casa, aunque ella no tiene el dinero suficiente por tal razón ahora solicita un crédito que lo utilizara para comprar cemento, arena, hierro y láminas.
Rosa espera con el corazón conseguir el crédito para terminar la construcción de su casa así darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida, y seguir construyendo su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa, 25, is married and has a lovely family with three children ranging in ages from one to nine.  Her humble family lives in a community in Santa Catarina Ixtahuacan.

In an effort to generate more income and help her husband with the household expenses, Rosa buys and sells typical clothing.  She has been in business for five years and thanks to her work she is able to support her family.

Rosa is a great mother who concerns herself with covering the family necessities.  Now her priority is finishing construction of her house but she does not have sufficient capital.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy cement, sand, iron and metal sheeting.  Rosa sincerely hopes to receive the loan to finish her house so her family can have a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy materials such as cement, sand, iron and metal sheeting.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 22 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, tiene 3 años de experiencia en el cultivo el cual inicio con capital propio, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego venderlos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, la joven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
The young woman whose face is blurred is 22 years old and lives in a high risk area.  She works in agriculture growing corn and has been in the trade three years, having started with her own capital.  At harvest time she stores the corn in graneries as show in the picture.  Later she sells it at different markets near her home.  

The young lady lives in her own home with her family.  She is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, herbicides, etc. to improve her income for a better quality of life.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Cesar Alfonso

texts.es: Cesar vive en casa propia con su hijo, el se dedica a la agricultura al cultivo de maíz y hortalizas, tiene 5 años de experiencia en el cultivo, comercializa sus productos en los alrededores de la zona donde el reside y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, pesticidas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y así poder continuar con su trabajo que le genera buenos ingresos.
texts.en: Cesar lives in his own house with his son.  He works in agriculture and grows corn and vegetables, and has five years of crop growing experience.  He sells his produce in neighboring areas.  With the income from sales Cesar covers some of the household expenses.  The loan he is requesting is to buy seeds, pesticides, fertilizers, manures, pest control agents, etc. so he can continue his work which gives him a good income.

loans.use: To buy seeds, pesticides, fertlizers, manures, pesta control agents, etc.

loans.name: Addis Marielos

texts.es:
La señora Addis Marielos de 27 años de edad vive con su conyugue tiene 1 hijo que depende de ella, radica en la ciudad de San Lorenzo al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia y se dedica desde hace 5 años al negocio de venta de ropa como ser, pantalones, faldas, vestidos, blusas, sandalias, zapatos, ella es una mujer emprendedora con deseos de salir adelante.
Addis esta solicitando el crédito para compra de varias docenas de ropa para mujer y caballeros, zapatos y sandalias, con el apoyo del crédito ella pretende mejorar mas su negocio y por ende tener más ganancias para esta época del mes.
Addis su sueño es ampliar más su negocio y mejorar sus ganancias y mejorar su calidad de vida junto a su familia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - MARZO  2015.
texts.en:
Addis Marielos, 27, lives with her husband and a dependent son.  She lives in the city of San Lorenzo in southern Honduras. She has her own home and has been selling clothing such as pants, skirts, dresses, blouses, sandals and shoes for five years.  She is an enterprising woman with a desire to get ahead.

Addis is requesting a loan to buy several dozen packs of women's and men's clothing, shoes and sandals.  With the help of the loan she intends to improve her business and, thus, earn more profit for this time of month.

Addis' goal is to grow her business and improve her earnings, as well as her family's quality of life.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - MARCH 2015

loans.use: To buy several dozen packs of women's and men's clothing, shoes and sandals.

loans.name: Farogat

texts.ru: Фарогат женщина средних лет проживающая в сельской местности. Ей 42 года и она занимается бизнесом. Она привозит из соседних стран материалы и продает на местном базаре. Сама Фарогат имеет высшее образование. По профессии она экономист. Так как она сама обучалась в вузе, она знает как трудно студентам и поэтому оказывает всяческую поддержку своему сыну, который обучается на финансиста в Малазии. В связи с кризисом торговля у Фарогат существенно снизилась, а оплаты университета у нее нет денег. С данной проблемой она решила обратиться в МДО "Арванд". На полученные деньги она оплатит договор сына.
texts.en:
Farogat is a middle-aged woman living in a rural area. She is 42 years old and works in business. She imports materials from neighbouring countries and sells them at the local bazaar. 

Farogat herself has a higher education. She is an economist by profession. Since she herself studied at a higher education institute, she knows how difficult it is for students. Thus, she gives all sorts of support to her son, who is studying to be a financier in Malaysia. 

As a result of the crisis, Farogat's sales have substantially decreased, thus she has no money to pay her son's university. With this problem, she decided to turn to MDO Arvand. Upon receiving the money, she will pay her son's contract.

loans.use: to pay for education

loans.name: Marlene Del Carmen

texts.es: Marlene de 37 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus hijos, ella se dedica a la siembra de maíz, se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 15 años, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarlo en los mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controle de plagas, herbicidas, etc.  y asi poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos.
texts.en:
Marlene, 37, is a single mother and lives in her own house with her children. She is a corn farmer and has been doing this job for 15 years. When her harvest is ready she stores it in the granary shown in the photo for selling later at the markets near her home.

Marlene is applying for a loan to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides and herbicides etc., so that she can continue with her work because it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, manure, pesticides and herbicides etc.

loans.name: Maria Hilda

texts.es: Doña Maria, tiene 63 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos y reside en una comunidad que pertenece a Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara.  Doña Maria tiene cultivado manzana y media de café y también vende carnes y embutidos en su casa para obtener otros ingresos. Esta actividad la realiza hace 7 años.  La cosecha la vende en la misma zona. Esta Solicitando un prestamo por 6,000 lempiras para pago de mano de obra y compra de abonos y fertilizantes para aplicarle al cultivo de café y mejorar la cosecha. Su plan es seguir trabajando aumentar la finca día a día  para un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Maria is 63 years old. She is a single mother with three children and lives in a village in Nueva Frontera, Santa Barbara. Maria grows apples and coffee, and she also sells meat and cold cuts at home in order to receive an additional income. She has been doing this for seven years, and sells her produce to locals.

Maria is requesting a loan of 6,000 lempiras [HNL] to pay for the labor needed to improve her coffee plantations and buy fertilizers. Her plan is to continue working and produce more every day in order to have a better future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her coffee plantations and pay for the labor needed to spread them.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a bathroom with a toilet so that her family are more comfortable.

loans.name: Alexi

texts.es:
Alexi es una persona  emprendedora y dedicada al comercio su fuente principal de ingresos proviene de su negocio, venta de granos, ubicado en su casa de habitación, este negocio lo atiende de manera personal hace 5 años, sus principales clientes son vecinos de su comunidad y comunidades vecinas ya que también sale a vender de manera ambulante, con la ayuda de los prestamos anteriores a logrado expandir su negocio y ahora vende sacos quintaleros al por mayor.
Alexi solicita el apoyo del Préstamo para la compra de producto para surtir su negocio con maíz, frijoles y arroz para la venta al por mayor y menor.
Alexi sueña con poder ampliar su negocio y abastecerlo de otros productos para suplir otras necesidades de los clientes y así poder mejorar su fuente de ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Alexi solicita el préstamo porque no cuenta con el capital suficiente para darle más fuerza a su negocio él cree que si invierte mas comprara producto mas barato y tendrá mejores ganancias con esto podrá ofrecer mejores comodidades a su familia.  

Honduras - Abril 2015
texts.en:
Alexi is an entrepreneurial person. He is a businessman who makes money selling grains at home. He has been in business for five years now, and his customers are mainly neighbors and people from nearby villages, since he also works as a street vendor. With the help of previous loans, he has expanded his business and is now selling grains by the quintal [100 lb.].

Alexi is requesting help through a loan to buy corn, beans and rice to sell, both in small and in large quantities. His dream is to be able to expand his business by selling a wider variety of products in order to fulfill his customers’ demands and improve his income and his living conditions.

Alexi is requesting this loan because he does not have enough money to give his business the boost it needs. He believes that by investing more, he will be able to negotiate lower prices and thus make better profits, and as a result, he will be able to better provide for his family.

Honduras - April 2015

loans.use: to buy rice, beans, and corn in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Gulsunbubu

texts.ru: Гулсунбубу, 63 года, замужем. У нее среднее образование, на пенсии, в качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1985 году благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Гулсунбубу, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 4 коровы, 2 лошади, 17 овец. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет около 14,000 сом (KGS). Гулсунбубу обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) для закупки скота. Она является лидером  группы "Спутник", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Гулсунбубу намерена улучшить благосостояние своей семьи и доходы от кредита направлять на развитие бизнеса.
texts.en: Gulsunbubu is 63 years old and married. She has a secondary education and is retired. She has been rearing animals to get income for her family since 1985, and thanks to her perseverance, determination and hard work Gulsunbubu now has four cows, two horses, and 17 sheep. The monthly income from the business is about 14,000 som (KGS). Gulsunbubu has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. She is the leader of the "Sputnik" group in which there are another two people besides her, making a total of three. Gulsunbubu intends to improve the well-being of her family and will direct the income from the loan to developing her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her headcount.

loans.name: Nhóm 02 Cụm 03 Thôn Thắng Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Lâm has a retail business selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.

Lâm is 40 years old and married with three children. She is the group leader of the Nhóm 02 Cụm 03 Thôn Thắng Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of four members. Lâm lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2014, Lâm joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. Lâm has successfully repaid three loans from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Lâm has been involved in this business for six years. The main hardship that Lâm faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Lâm hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Nhóm 05 Cụm 26 Thôn Thắng Xã Quảng Nham Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoa has a retail business selling fish. She is requesting a loan to purchase fish to resell.

Hoa is 28 years old and married with no children. Hoa is the group leader of the Nhóm 05 Cụm 26 Thôn Thắng Xã Quảng Nham solidarity group, which consists of four members. Hoa lives in Quang Xuong district, a rural town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hoa's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for six years. One of the most critical business difficulties that concerns her is the lack of capital.

In the future, Hoa hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and for her family to be healthy and happy.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to resell

loans.name: Burmakan

texts.ru: Бурмакан, 44 года, замужем. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1998 году благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Бурмакан, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: 2 коровы. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет около 7,000 сом (KGS). Бурмакан обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) для закупки скота. Она является участником группы "Спутник", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Бурмакан намерена увеличить поголовье скота и улучшить благосостояние своей семьи.
texts.en: Burmakan is 44 years old and married. She has a secondary education. She started rearing animals in 1998 to get income for her family. Today, thanks to her perseverance, dedication and hard work, Burmakan has two cows. The monthly income from the business is about 7,000 som (KGS). Burmakan has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. She is a member of the "Sputnik" group in which there are another two people besides her, a total of three. Burmakan intends to increase the headcount of her livestock and to improve the well-being of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her headcount.

loans.name: Chynara

texts.ru: Чынара, 24 года, не замужем. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дохода для своей семьи занимается животноводством, стартовав в 1999 году благодаря упорству, целеустремленности и трудолюбию Чынары, на сегодняшний день у нее есть: корова, 5 овец, 5 коз. Ежемесячный доход от бизнеса составляет около 9,000 сом (KGS). Чынара обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 35,000 сом (KGS) для закупки скота. Она является участником группы "Спутник", в которой кроме нее состоят еще 2 человека, всего их 3. Чынара намерена и дальше увеличивать поголовье скота.
texts.en: Chynara is 24 years old and unmarried. She has a secondary education. She started rearing animals in 1999 to get income for her family. Today, thanks to her perseverance, dedication, and hard work, Chynara has a cow, five sheep, and five goats. The monthly income from the business is about 9,000 som (KGS). Chynara has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 35,000 som (KGS) to buy livestock. She is a member of the "Sputnik" group in which there are another two people besides her, a total of three. Chynara intends to further increase her number of livestock.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock in order to increase her headcount.

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Mary Grace requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

Mary Grace has been in this business for six years now, and earns additional income from buying and selling personal collections.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cocoa to sell

loans.name: Adela

texts.en:
Adela is married. She is 51 years old now.

Adela has a fish vending business in the Philippines and requested a PHP 22,000 loan through NWTF to buy more boxes of fish to sell.

Adela has been in this business for four years. In the future, Adela would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Natividad De Jesus

texts.es: Don natividad de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar el se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace varios años, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los graneros que muestra la fotografía, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. para continuar con su trabajo y así tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Natividad is 46 years old and lives in his own house with his family. For several years now, he has made a living by growing corn. When his crop is ready, he stores it in the granary shown in the photograph. He is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control chemicals, herbicides, etc. to continue his work and improve his income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control chemicals, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Evelin Del Carmen

texts.es: Evelin de 38 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus tres hijas, ella se dedica desde hace 9 años a la actividad agrícola, almacena su cosecha en los graneros que muestra la fotografía para luego comercializarlos en los alrededores de la zona donde ella reside, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y asi seguir con sus cultivos para tener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Evelin is 38 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and three daughters. She has worked as a farmer for the last nine years. Evelin stores her harvest in the granary shown in the photograph and later sells her crops in the area around her home. She is requesting a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control chemicals, herbicides, etc. and thus continue farming to improve her income.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, compost, pest control chemicals, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
Marco es un hombre de 25 años de edad, soltero, sin hijos, y su negocio es el comercio de electrodomésticos y equipos de sonido. 
Él es emprendedor, independiente, activo, constante, responsable y trabajador. su negocio lo desarrolla en la zona ‘villa Fátima’ área caracterizada por recibir los cultivos de la hoja de Coca procedente del norte del departamento y por la terminal de transporte público con destino a poblaciones del norte, de clima frío y ventoso, vientos que llegan de la cordillera a una altura de 3600 metros sobre el nivel del mar.  
Marco es de tez morena, ojos pardos, cabello corto negro, baja estatura, complexión física robusta. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que es propia y está construida de ladrillo y cemento con techo de calamina y cuenta con agua potable, energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Su negocio es la venta de electrodomésticos como; microondas, licuadoras, zumidoras, batidoras, aspiradoras, etc., actividad que realiza en su domicilio de lunes a sábado en horario del día. Paralelamente trabaja como músico tecladista en un grupo de cumbia. “vivo feliz con mis actividades, soy consciente de que todo trabajo tiene su sacrificio y de que nada es fácil en la vida por eso asumo mis dificultades y las hago parte del trabajo…” comenta. La ventaja de sus actividades es que los horarios no se cruzan entre sí, la desventaja es la falta de capital de inversión para su nuevo emprendimiento. Su sueño es abrir un restaurante para ser un empresario gastronómico, él desea ampliar su negocio mediante la adquisición de un restaurante para administrarlo. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamo con la institución en 7 años que desarrolla estas actividades.
Es por esos motivos que Marco solicita un préstamo para abrir un restaurante y con los beneficios cuidar a sus padres.
texts.en:
Marco is a 25 year old man, He is single and has no children and his business is selling appliances and sound systems. He is enterprising, independent, active, stable, responsible and hardworking. He runs his business in the area of ‘Villa Fátima’, an area characterized by receiving the coca leaf harvests from the northern part of the department and for its public transportation terminal with destinations to the northern communities. It has a cold and windy climate, with winds that come from the mountains 3,600 meters above sea level. 
  
Marco has dark skin, brown eyes, short black hair, short stature, and a robust build. He lives in his parents' house, which they own and which is built of brick and cement with a metal sheeting roof. It has potable water, electricity and plumbing. His business is selling appliances such as microwaves, blenders, juicers, mixers, vacuums, etc. He does this activity from his house Monday through Saturday during the day. He also plays the keyboard in a cumbia group. "I am happy with my activities. I know that every job has sacrifices and that nothing is easy in life. That is why I take on my difficulties and make them a part of the job…” he remarks. The advantage of his activities is that the schedule don't interfere with each other. The disadvantage is the lack of investment capital for his new enterprise. His dream is to open a restaurant to be a gastronomic entrepreneur. He wants to expand his business by acquiring a restaurant to run. This is his first cycle with the institution in the 7 years that he has been doing these activities. 

It is for these reasons that Marco is asking for a loan to open a restaurant and care for his parents with the profits.

loans.use: to open a restaurant and care for his parents with the profits.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca tiene 68 años de edad, vive con su hijo en casa propia en una comunidad grande en la zona urbana de Zaña, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores como carneros, patos, gallinas y cuyes, desde hace varios años, cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en su distrito. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de una mayor cantidad de carneros para engorde y de esta manera generar mayores ingresos para su familia lo que le permitirá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Francisca is 68 years old. She lives with her son in her own house in a large community in the urban area of  Zaña. Its residents work in agriculture, commerce and livestock. It is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

For several years, she raised and sold small animals such as sheep, ducks, chickens and guinea pigs. She has good personal and work references in her district. She has asked for a loan to buy a larger quantity of sheep to fatten and thus generate more income for her family, which will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a larger number of sheep to fatten.

loans.name: Grupo  Xojola Sector Loma Group

texts.es:
Marta ( es la señora de en medio  de blusa anaranjada) una mujer digna de admirar porque gracias  a su esfuerzo ha logrado mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, ella cuenta que gracias al crédito anterior logro comprar más pollos y comprar su concentrado y pudo venderlos a un buen precio, ella y sus integrantes lograron mejorar sus ingresos, pero ellas ahora quieren seguir mejorado la calidad de vida, por tal razón solicitan un nuevo crédito que invertirán ahora en su negocio de compra y venta de ropa típica.
 El gran sueño de Marta es que su negocio siga creciendo  y construir una casa as grande para más comodidad de su familia.
texts.en:
Marta (the woman in the middle with an orange blouse). She is a woman worthy of admiration because thanks to her hard work she has been able to improve her family's quality of life. She says that thanks to the previous loan she was able to buy more chickens and their concentrated food and sell them at a good price. She and the other members were able to improve their income, but now they want to keep improving their quality of life. That is why they are asking for a new loan, which they will invest in buying and selling traditional clothing.  

Marta's big dream is for her business to keep growing and to build a bigger house so her family will be more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy and sell traditional clothing.

loans.name: Kenzheaim

texts.ru: Кенжеайм, 38 лет, замужем, мать 4 детей. Образование у Кенжеайм среднее, дополнительно много лет она занимается сельским хозяйством, а именно полеводством и животноводством. По характеру Кенжеайм очень приятная и отзывчивая женщина, она очень ответственная и трудолюбивая. В хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 40 овец. Также Кенжеайм выращивает на 0,96 ГА собственной земли фасоль, экологически чистая продукция пользуется большим спросом. Совокупный доход составляет около 10,000 (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития бизнеса, Кенжеайм решила обратиться в Банк «Бай - Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку коровы, 5 овец. На прибыль от кредита она планирует и дальше развивать свою деятельность.
texts.en: Kenzheaim is 38 years old, married, and the mother of four children. Kenzheaim has a secondary education and has been engaged in agriculture for quite a few years, specifically crop growing and animal rearing. By her nature, Kenzheaim is a very pleasant and sympathetic woman, and she is very responsible and hard-working. On her smallholding she has three cows and 40 sheep. Kenzheaim also cultivates beans on 0.96 hectares of her own land, an environmentally friendly product that is in great demand. The gross income is about 10,000 som (KGS) per month. In order to further develop her business, Kenzheaim has decided to apply to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy a cow and five sheep. She plans to use the profits from the loan to further develop her business.

loans.use: to buy a cow and five sheep in order to increase her herd.

loans.name: Angel Pastor

texts.es:
El señor Ángel Pastor de 25 años de edad vive con su esposo en su casa de habitación donde cuenta con una hacienda ya que produce leche y la vende a los productores de lácteos, También elabora cuajada, sus clientes lo  visitan en su hacienda y su casa para comprar este alimento, es conocido por ser un joven luchador  a su temprana edad cuenta con ganado y terreno, radica en aldea la cuesta al Sur de Honduras. 
Ángel está solicitando 15, 000.00 lempiras para la compra  de una vaca con cría.  Con el apoyo de este credito el espera poder comprar la vaca ya que un amigo vecino de la comunidad se la está vendiendo y se la está ofreciendo a un precio cómodo.
Ángel espera mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia por medio de su hacienda. Ya que su sueño es crecer más en sus negocios y mejorar sus ingresos.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Abril 2015.
texts.en:
Ángel Pastor, age 25, lives with his wife in his home where he has a dairy farm. He sells milk to producers of dairy products. He also makes curds. His clients visit him on his farm and at home to buy this product. He is known for being a hard-working young person. At his young age, he has livestock and land. He is settled in the La Cuesta neighbourhood in the south of Honduras.
Ángel is requesting 15,000 lempiras for the purchase of a cow with young. With this loan, he hopes to be able to buy the cow because a friend and neighbour will sell it to him and is offering a good price.
Angel hopes to improve his and his family's quality of life via his farm. His dream is to expand his businesses and improve his income
San Lorenzo, Honduras - April 2015.

loans.use: to buy a cow to raise for his business.

loans.name: Gulom

texts.ru: Гулом мужчина среднего возраста. Ему 43 года.  Он сам родился и вырос в сельском местности. С детства он был старательным и любил учиться. Её любовь к учебе пробудила его поступить в колледж. Где получил неполное высшее образование. Он очень трудолюбивый мужчина. Семьянин, и заботливый отец 4-детей.  В данное время Гулом является председателем кишлака Метар. Со стороны односельчан имеет хорошие отзывы о себе.  От того что он сам любил учебу старается,  чтобы его дети тоже получили высшее образование и этим вносили весомый вклад в развитии своей республике.  Гулом создает все условий, чтобы его дети получили все знания, который им необходимы. В этом году его сын поступил в ВУЗ. Он тоже как свой отец любитель книг и хочет изучать все тонкости компьютерной технологии.  Он изучает компьютер в университете, но для того чтобы хорошо изучить ему необходимо заниматься и дома.  Чтобы купить ноутбук и оплатить обучение сына Гулому нужны денежные средства. Гулом обратился за кредитом  в  МДО “Арванд”. За полученный кредит он собирается купить ноутбук и оплатить сыну учебу.
texts.en:
Gulom is a middle-aged man. He is 43 years old. He was born and raised in the countryside. From childhood he has been diligent and loved to study. His love for learning roused him to go to college, where he obtained a partial higher education. 

He is a very hardworking man. He is a family man, and the caring father of four children. Because he himself loved learning, he is making the effort to ensure that his children also receive a higher education, and with it make a significant contribution to the development of their republic.

Gulom sets up all the conditions so that his children get all the knowledge that is necessary to them. This year, his son entered a higher education institute. Like his father, he also loves books, and wants to learn all the finer points of computer technology. He is studying computers in university, but in order to study well it is necessary for him to work at home as well.

In order to buy a notebook and to pay for his son's education, Gulom needs funds. Gulom has applied for a loan from MDO Arvand. On receiving the loan, he intends to buy a notebook and pay for his son's studies.

loans.use: tuition fees and the purchase of a laptop

loans.name: Oymkhol

texts.ru: На фотографии изображена очень добрая, миролюбивая и приятная в общении женщина. Ей 54 года. Ее зовут Оймхол. Она проживает на районе Вахш, Хатлонской области. Оймхол живет вместе с дочерью, сыном и невесткой. Оймхол вместе с членами семьи занимается земледелием. Она не один год не пропускает и всегда ждет сезон посева.
